item.title: Born at China’s WeBank, now incubating in the ASF - Introducing Apache EventMesh
item.guid: Born at China’s WeBank, now incubating in the ASF - Introducing Apache EventMesh
item.description: Guangsheng Chen, the founder of Apache EventMesh, has been buzzing since the project was welcomed into the Apache Software Foundation (ASF)’s incubator in February 2021.
